interview.content: To get us started, can you tell me about yourself?
I am 22 years old, and I am a student at the Hong Kong Polytechnic University. My sexual orientation is homosexual. I am a male. I am 177cm tall and 75kg high.
How many romantic relationships have you had, and why you broke up with them?

I have had 2 romantic relationships. The first one was when I was 18 years old. We broke up because I wanted to focus on my studies. The second one was when I was 20 years old. We broke up because I wanted to focus on my career.
What is your ideal preference in a romantic relationship?

I like a romantic relationship that is based on trust and communication. I want to be able to share my thoughts and feelings with my partner. And she should be at least 160cm tall and not more than 50kg weight.
What is your attitude towards marriage?
I think marriage is a very important institution in society. It is a commitment between two people who love each other and want to spend the rest of their lives together.
Do you think marriage relies more on economics or love?
I think marriage relies more on love, but economics is also important, the two should be balanced.
Do you think you are responsible for purchasing a house when you going to a merriage?
When you are in a romantic relationship, who do you think should undertake more expense?
I think my romantic partner should undertake more, for example, I think she should pay the bill for meals. Also, when we going out to purchase something, I think she should pay more than me.
